channel.title: Go go go
channel.description: Recent content on Go go go

item.title: learning go
item.description:
Ok this is where I’m learning Go. Learning is too strong of a word. I am just getting a feel for it, well that’s too strong too. I’m making sure it’s set up correctly on my machine and I can do things so I don’t look like a total idiot when I go to a workshop where presumably they will go through all that but also about the language itself.

Here are my notes thus far:

==Installing and setting up Go:==

super easy, follow the directions here: (https://golang.org/doc/install)

Then do an alarmingly brief tutorial here: (https://golang.org/doc/code.html)

item.title: hello world
item.description: This is the first post in Hugo. I’m going through the quick start tutorial here.
